backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing authorization, Stripe checkout/session status calls, user profiles, and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report linking a deployment-related feature to specific files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment guide detailing prerequisites, safety checks, identity setup, and DFX steps for production release.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color variables, dark mode, component styles, and print rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the app root and html2pdf.js for PDF generation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing branding attribution and a brief GST Invoice Pro description.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, login/logout via Internet Identity, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/InvoicePreview.t: Invoice preview renderer with GST calculations and PDF export using html2pdf.js.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapping pages with Header, Footer, and an Outlet for nested routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation to create a checkout session by calling the backend actor and returning parsed session data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, themes, and custom utility classes including Indian‑themed colors.
frontend/src/lib/gst.ts: Calculates GST totals from invoice data, returning subtotal, tax, and interstate status.
frontend/src/lib/states.ts: Exports a list of Indian states and union territories.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by mounting React, setting up QueryClient, and wrapping it with the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays an authenticated user dashboard with subscription status, stats, and recent invoices.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceCreator.tsx: Provides a form-driven GST invoice creator with item management, validation, and preview support.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the marketing landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and CTA buttons for creating invoices or viewing pricing.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Displays a payment failure message with details and options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Shows a successful payment confirmation and links to the dashboard or invoice creation.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders free and paid subscription plans and triggers checkout session creation for upgrades.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including versioning, features, and deployment‑related state.
